content: हासः [हस्-भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Laughter, laughing, smile; भासो हासः <ls>P. R. 1. 22.</ls> {@--2@} Joy, mirth, merriment. {@--3@} Laughter, as the prevailing feeling of the {%rasa%} called हास्य; see <ls>S. D. 207.</ls> {@--4@} Derisive laughter; <ls>R. 12. 36.</ls> {@--5@} Opening, blowing, expanding (as of lotuses &c.); कूलानि सामर्षतयेव तेनुः सरोजलक्ष्मीं स्थलपद्महासैः <ls>Bk. 2. 3.</ls>
